name: Kumare Restaurant & Bakery
address: 8130 Park Rd, Richmond, BC V6Y 2C1, Canada

hasMenuItem.description: 10" skewer grilled street style.

hasMenuItem.name: Lumpiang Shanghai
hasMenuItem.description: Nine pieces of deep fried bite sized pork spring rolls served with sweet chilli sauce.

hasMenuItem.description: Steamed rice available in cup or bowl sizes.

hasMenuItem.name: BBQ Pork Box
hasMenuItem.description: Filipino style BBQ pork served on a bed of java rice with a side of atchara (pickled papaya).

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Bicol Express Box
hasMenuItem.description: Spicy coconut curried pork served with a side of steamed rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Inihaw na Liempo Box
hasMenuItem.description: Grilled pork belly on a bed of steamed rice.  Served with a side of fresh tomatoes and onions.

hasMenuItem.name: Pork Dinuguan Box
hasMenuItem.description: A Filipino delicacy made with pork blood.  Served with a side of steamed rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Mang Tomas Lechon Sauce Bottle (19.4 oz)
Breakfast Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Longanisa (filipino style sausage), tocino (cured sweet pork), tapa (sauteed cured beef), lumpiang shanghai (pork spring rolls), fried egg, atchara (pickled papaya), and steamed rice topped with fried garlic.

hasMenuItem.name: Deluxe Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Calamares, crispy pata (deep fried pork hock), inihaw na bangus (grilled milkfish), mango salad, bbq chicken skewer, bbq pork skewer, and steamed rice.

hasMenuItem.name: All Meat Platter
hasMenuItem.description: Lumpiang shanghai (pork spring rolls), dinakdakan (grilled sliced pork and onions tossed in mayo dressing), crispy pata (deep fried pork hock), inihaw na pusit (grilled squid), and Kumare's fried chicken.

hasMenuItem.name: Value Platter B
hasMenuItem.description: Lumpiang shanghai (pork spring rolls), embutido (filipino meatloaf), chicken inasal (marinated with lemongrass), tortang talong (eggplant omelette), bbq chicken skewer, bbq pork skewer, and steamed rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Value Platter A
hasMenuItem.description: Vegetable spring roll, inihaw na liempo (grilled pork belly), tomato onion salad, bbq chicken skewer, bbq pork skewer, crispy makarel, and steamed rice.

hasMenuItem.name: Turon
hasMenuItem.description: Two pieces of deep fried banana and jackfruit spring rolls.

hasMenuItem.name: Egg Pie Slice
hasMenuItem.description: Rich, creamy custard filling in a flaky, golden crust.

hasMenuItem.name: Cassava Cake - gluten free
hasMenuItem.description: Cassava cake is a traditional Filipino moist cake made from grated cassava, coconut milk, eggs, young coconut strings, and condensed milk.  It has a custard layer on top.  Gluten free.

hasMenuItem.name: Leche Flan - gluten free
hasMenuItem.description: Custard with caramel sauce

hasMenuItem.name: Hopia

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Chicken
hasMenuItem.description: Deep fried chicken nuggets.

hasMenuItem.name: Calamares

hasMenuItem.description: Beef, tripe, tendon, bile, onion, ginger and bitter melon.

hasMenuItem.name: Crispy Makarel or Tilapia
hasMenuItem.description: Deep fried makarel or tilapia with your choice of sauce: sarciado: egg and tomato sauce, sweet and sour: red and green bell peppers and pineapples, escabeche: tomato based sauce with carrots, ginger, bell peppers.

review.reviewBody: The Lechon Kawali is delicious and the portions are generous. With an extensive menu, Kumare will be my go to for Filipino food!!

I orderd sinigang it came in a small container, also ordered the bbq chicken skewers cause it showed two of them on the photo thinking I would get two got my order and only got three bbq skewers very misleading to the people who are going to order from here
it is too expensive and not worth the price.
Very small portion for the price
